class abcmodel.surface_layer.StandardSurfaceLayerModel[source]#

Standard surface layer model with atmospheric stability corrections.

Calculates surface-atmosphere exchange using Monin-Obukhov similarity theory with stability functions and iterative solution for Obukhov length.

Parameters:

  • None.

  • Processes

  • ---------

  • properties. (1. Calculate effective wind speed and surface)

  • length. (2. Determine bulk Richardson number and solve for Obukhov)

  • corrections. (3. Compute drag coefficients with stability)

  • variables. (4. Calculate momentum fluxes and 2m diagnostic)

static calculate_2m_variables(wtheta, wq, surf_pressure, k, z0h, z0m, obukhov_length, thetasurf, qsurf, ustar, uw, vw)[source]#

Calculate 2m diagnostic meteorological variables.

Return type:

tuple[Array, Array, Array, Array, Array, Array]

calculate_drag_coefficients(zsl, k, obukhov_length, z0h, z0m)[source]#

Calculate drag coefficients with stability corrections.

Return type:

tuple[Array, Array]

static calculate_momentum_fluxes(ueff, u, v, drag_m)[source]#

Calculate momentum fluxes and friction velocity.

Return type:

tuple[Array, Array, Array]

calculate_rib_function(zsl, oblen, rib_number, z0h, z0m)[source]#

Calculate Richardson number function for iteration.

Return type:

Array

calculate_rib_function_term(zsl, oblen, z0h, z0m)[source]#

Calculate function term for derivative calculation.

Return type:

Array

static compute_ra(state)[source]#

Calculate aerodynamic resistance from wind speed and drag coefficient.

Return type:

Array

ribtol(zsl, rib_number, z0h, z0m)[source]#

Iterative solution for Obukhov length from Richardson number (JAX version).

run(state, const)[source]#

Calculate surface layer turbulent exchange and diagnostic variables.

Updates#

Updates all surface layer variables including momentum fluxes, drag coefficients, Obukhov length, and 2m diagnostic meteorological variables.
